title: ScreenWolf
info:
《屏幕有狼》是一款桌面宠物游戏，在电脑屏幕上放置个性化的虚拟宠物。每只宠物拥有独特动画、行为逻辑和交互能力，支持自由加载与自定义，为桌面增添生机与乐趣！ 
 ScreenWolf is a desktop pet game that places personalized virtual pets on a computer screen. Each pet has unique animations, behavioral logic, and interactive abilities, supporting free loading and customization, adding vitality and fun to the desktop!
